column2:
"Hardly a surprise, but the dragorii are a tough
bunch. Which speaks volumes about you for
cutting through them with such facility."

"While they were always strong, I don't recall
them ever displaying such animosity toward
ARKS operatives in the past."

"We've had dealings with their kind for quite
some time now."

"We've deciphered their language completely.
We should be able to reason with some of them."
"Ah, perfect. Here we are now."

"No offense, but they might view a warrior of
your caliber as a challenge. Allow me to take
the lead here."

"Greetings, dragorii. I am called Aki. Might I
ask you a few questions?"

"He's responded to my voice. Is that recognition
I detect? Good, then they've deciphered our
language as well. Excellent."

"Then this is what's known as the cold shoulder.
The silent treatment. Hmm, yes. Fascinating.
Fascinating, and incredibly irksome."

"Heh, this merely makes me want to force them
into communication all the more! Ha ha ha ha!"

"Enjoy this moment, lizard! For I swear to you,
you'll soon find me very difficult to ignore!
Very difficult indeed!"
"Professor! Professor, don't! And she's gone."

"But it's strange that the dragorii didn't attack us.
Why do you suppose that is?"

"A different aura? Hmm, I fear such subtle and,
frankly, unscientific distinctions are lost on me."

"Oh, but this is no time to talk! Come, hurry, we
have to catch up with the professor!"

"やはり龍族は屈強だな……
そして、それを平然としのぐ
キミもたいしたものだよ。"

"とはいえ、昨今の龍族は
いささかアークスへの敵愾心が強いな。
昔はここまでではなかったと聞く。"

"アークスと龍族は
かねてより交流を持っていたのだよ。"

"言語の翻訳も終わっているし
話の通じるものだって
それなりにいるはずなんだがね。"

"おや、おあつらえ向きに
龍族ではないか。"

"キミのような実力者が相対すると
ふいに襲いかかってくるかもしれない。
まあ、ここは私に任せてくれたまえ。"

"やあ、龍族のキミ。
私の名はアキという。
よければ少し話でもしないか？"

"こちらの言葉には反応している……
向こうの言葉も翻訳済み……
なるほど、なるほど。"

"これが俗に言う、無視というやつだな。
……なるほど、なかなかに腹が立つ。"

"ふふ、ははははは！
ますますもって交流したくなったぞ
龍族！"

"待っていろ！
この私を、龍族にとって無視しがたい
存在へと昇華させてやる！"

"あ、先生、先生ーっ！
だめだ、行っちゃいましたよ。"

"それにしても、今の龍族さんは
襲ってきませんでしたね。
どうしてなんでしょう？"

"纏っている空気、ですか？
うーん、ええと……
僕にはちょっとわからないですね。"

"ってああ、話してるうちに先生が！
<%me>さん
追いかけましょう！"
"The Proud Children of Fire"
"Chapter 4: The Dragorii Disease"
"Proud scales of Amduscia"
"第４章 龍の病"
